fat: her BMI is measured in acres.
that her bellybutton gets home 15 minutes before she does.
that when she was diagnosed with a flesh-eating disease, the doctor gave her ten years to live.
ugly: that when she went to a beautician it took 12 hours... to get a quote!
that she looked out the window and got arrested for mooning.
that people go as her for Halloween.
stupid: that it took her 2 hours to watch 60 Minutes!
that when your dad said it was chilly outside, she ran out the door with a spoon.
that when she saw the "Under 17 not admitted" sign at a movie theatre, she went home and got 16 friends.
